name: Minimal Brick Breaker
description:
Minimal Brick Breaker offers a new experience on this classic arcade game.

As the name says it, the game is based on a minimalist design. The game is very simple and focuses on the gameplay. 
No score ! 
No life count !
On the game screens there are only bricks, balls, and your pad.

Each sets of levels has its own set of color, for a total of 175 colorful levels.
For each level you have 3 lives.

Finish the game to unlock two special game modes : Microgravity Mode and Epileptic Mode !

Features :
- 175 levels
- 3 types of bricks
- 9 powerups
- 2 specials modes : Microgravity and Epileptic
- 3 speeds
